Posts.Content: Goin to hosp tomorrow for masectomy, diep reconstruction and lymoh node removal- just looking someone to talk to xx
Posts.Title: Diep, masectomy and lymph node removal in 2 days- worried

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for taking time to reply. I am so glad it wasnt as bad as you thought (hope mines is same). In hosp now for op in morning - cant wait to get it over with but glad you found things manageable xx
Posts.Title: Diep, masectomy and lymph node removal in 2 days- worried

Posts.Content: Thank you so much- a last we positive story before i try to settle for tomorrows op is just what i needed.  Hard to stop all the doubts if im doin the right thing even though i know i am . So glad i posted and got some lovely responses.  #positive thinking   Xx
Posts.Title: Diep, masectomy and lymph node removal in 2 days- worried

Posts.Content: I am trying to put on a brave face and i do have alot of support- just worried in general as times now here n il be recovering and then starting chemo. Ive 3 kids n know i wont be able to do much for a while. How are you doin x
Posts.Title: Diep, masectomy and lymph node removal in 2 days- worried
